dialogue.text: I gave you the chance to ablige but You just won't.
Every single furry you know and love was corrupted by me
Your friend meowie was fixed and went under me and almost tore you to shreds, what fun!
If you win this last battle, you'll get your friend back and I'll spare your furry friends....
But if you lose, borky's, bf's, and gf's souls are mine to keep, just imagine how much FUN we'll have
My friends need me now, it's now or nothing!!!!!!!!!!!!!
